metadata.description: A faithful adaptation of the classic horror novel by Bram Stoker that not only includes the famous tale. The entire saga is here from Harker's journey to Transylvania, to the crash of the ship Demeter on the shores of England, to the chase of men after an immortal... this is the story of Dracula. Adapted by Steven Philip Jones (CALIBER's Sherlock Holmes)
metadata.name: Dracula
